author: rgardler
msg: Add a warning and a workaround for a bug in the plugin download mechanism tat affects Forrest when called from within a third party ANT script.

author: rgardler
msg: Add a note informing users that plugins may be downloaded on the first execution

author: rgardler
msg: use {version.name} in error report in order to work around a bug that prevents {plugin.name} being set when Forrest is called from ANT

msg: Fix for concurrency issue with deserialized schema grammars.
